title: Scheduled Maintenance - February 15, 2024
content: We will be performing a scheduled maintenance on Thursday, February 15, 2024 at 7:00 AM PST (10:00 AM EST / 4:00 PM CET / 2:00 AM AEDT Feb. 16).

title: Cash Shop Update for February 14
content: Valentine's SSB, Permanent Friendship Items, Valentine Royal Styles, and more!

title: February 2024 Community Contests and Events
content: Take a look at the new and upcoming Community Contests below, and be prepared to test your imagination!

title: v.248 Hotfixes - February 7, 2024
content: Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that addresses a variety of bugs and issues reported within the v.248 Strawberry Farm Festival update.

title: [Completed] Unscheduled Channel Maintenance - February 6, 2024
content: [Updated Feb 6 at 10:13 PM PST] The unscheduled channel maintenance has been completed. Thank you for your patience.

title: Cash Shop Update for February 7
content: Gachapon Update, Royal Styles, Choice Styles, and more!
